Articles.Content:
KASA 

Found an Agency

 

Is there life on Mars? 

Land on Duna.

 

Jamestown

Land Colony Parts On The Mun

 

Hephaestus

Build a ship in orbit of a star closer than it's Closest Planet

 

Star Man

EVA

 

... - .- -.-- 

Fall into a Black hole

 

Rocket Man

Ascend from Eve's Surface

 

Primed for World Domination

Ship a Colony constructer to a Planet's Moon.

 

What do you mean they faked the Mun landing?

Land on Tylo Before the Mun

 

Green Skies Above
Land on Laythe

 

From our ancestors

Find an obelisc (if they still exist)

 

Waiting in the Sky

Orbit a potentially habitable world

 

A Play on Fate

Break your heat shield during reentry but still survive.

 

For all Kebal Kind!

Be the first out of all agencies to land the Mun in a Multiplayer save.

 

Evernna

Send a Probe to Eve's Surface

 

Mt Kerverest

Eva within the highest 100 meters of Kerbin's Land.

 

Amnesia

Come back from Dres's Surface.

 

Glum Glumo

Orbit Glumo

 

"How did we get Here"

Ascend from Ovin

 

To Boldly Go!

Land on Eeloo.

 

Worth a While

Fly a Mission for over a century.

 

SST-  oh

Crash a Single Stage To Orbit into the ground.

 

Life on Laythe

Establish a Colony on Laythe

 

Centuari Dreams

Land Everywhere.

 

Dream On

Fall off an Object Whilst EVA 10,000 Meters Above Kerbins Mountains

Edited January 31, 2023 by NexustheNinja19
Many New Achievement Ideas

Moon man: Deorbit a spacecraft using EVA jetpack. 

Melon Eusk Kerman: colonize Duna.

The only thing is Musks not the first one to advocated colonizing Mars. Ray Bradbury wrote about it in the Martian chronicles,(written before Musk was even born and the idea of traveling to mars goes back to the 1800s.

Congratulations on the destruction of the Kerbal Space Center!

You have made the first jump into interstellar space!

To Infinity and Beyond! - Reach escape velocity from Kerbin

Let Me Play Among the Stars- Enter interstellar space 

I Didn’t Need Frames Anyway- Launch a craft with more than 1,000 parts

Masochist- Launch a craft with more than 2,500 parts

Houston, We Have a Problem- Run out of snacks

Open Pod Bay Doors- Perform the Materials Study experiment in space around Jool

Yep. Looks like dirt.- Take a surface sample while landed at Kerbin

One Small Step for Kerbal..- Go on EVA while landed at the Mun.

Tourist Trap- Get a Tourist kerbal stranded on another celestial body.

PR Disaster- Lose a Tourist kerbal.

Chaotic Evil- Destroy another player’s vessel in Multiplayer.

Stop Hitting Yourself!- Destroy one of your own KSC facilities.

Madman- Descend to an altitude of less than 100 km on Jool.. and return to space.

Anomaly Hunter- Find any easter egg.

Dark Side of the Mun- Pass behind the Mun.

Dark Side of the Mun II- Land on the Mun at night.

Spider-Jeb- Using a rover, climb up a slope of 75 degrees or more.

Atomic Age- Unlock the LV-N NERV Atomic Rocket Motor.

Road Trip- Drive a total of 1,000 km by rover.

Edited January 27, 2023 by Jack Joseph Kerman

Unconsumable: Take a surface sample while landed at Minmus. 

Carpet Bombing: launching a rocket that have over 20 stages. 

You should watch the tutorial: start a new save without watching the tutorial 

Edited January 28, 2023 by Abel Military Services
